channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Visual Email Designer for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Visual Email Designer for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-3860|2024-08-03T01:20:58.327Z -- unknown -- visual%20email%20designer%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Visual Email Designer for WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 1.7.2 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by users with a role as low as author.
